title: Snowflake Data Engineering Assignment
description: Set up a Snowflake environment, ingest data from CSV files, and implement data access controls using masking and row-level security policies.
requirements: Create a Snowflake warehouse for data processing
Create a database and schema for the project
Create a table to store transaction data
Load sample transaction data from CSV files
Apply column-level masking policies for sensitive data
Create row-level security policies for data access control
Create a stored procedure for data validation
Set up automated tasks for data processing
expected_outputs: Transaction table with proper data types
Data successfully loaded from CSV files
Masking policies applied to sensitive columns
RLS policies implemented for access control

code_quality.description: Code structure, best practices, and error handling

documentation.description: Code comments, markdown cells, and explanations

problem_solving.description: How well the solution addresses the requirements
